mapper.select: select u.profilePhoto, u.nickname as fromid, u.id as fromUserId, n.targetid, n.type, n.postid, max(n.regdate) as regdate, a.URL as postPhoto, a.filter, f.isFlw, n.unread from tbl_notice n left join tbl_user u on n.fromid=u.id left join (select * from tbl_attach group by postid) a on n.postid=a.postid left join (SELECT followedid as isFlw FROM tbl_follow WHERE userid=#{userid}) f on n.fromid=f.isFlw where n.targetid=#{userid} group by fromUserId, targetid, type, postid order by regdate desc
